npcSpeech.text: Ai, ai. There is information I have to relay to you. Not long ago the mischevious Imp Smurg passed by here he went to my right. He was speaking much clearer than before, I suspect he always knew how to speak but just blurted garbage for no purpose... He was muttering about stopping and being Bitter or a bitter coffee press... Then seconds ago someone from Gemtech security passed by me and went to the platform on my left. She said she was looking for something stolen. I thought it would be best to let you know everything I saw...
You are welcome. I wish you luck.

response.text: Tell me where they went again.

npcSpeech.text: Smurg went to your left and the security person went to the right.
I think we will play an important role in the events to come
